translation.en: [Geoffrey] Good morning, Lusaka!
This is Reporter Geoffrey bringing you the Lusaka News!
translation.it: Sono il reporter Geoffrey con le notizie di Lusaka!

translation.en: While the sun may be shining brightly, last night another mysterious tornado struck.
translation.it: Ora il sole splende, ma ieri c'è stato un altro misterioso tornado

translation.en: Its powerful winds knocked out power for hours.
translation.it: che ha tolto la corrente per ore.

translation.en: -Iye, Geoffrey, I know. -[man] Hey, iwe!
Elo, I was busy finishing my project for the Science fair ka.
translation.it: Ed ero impegnata col progetto di scienze.

translation.en: Geoffrey, do you realize Mr. Magedzee
translation.it: Ti rendi conto che ci sarà il sig. Magedzee?

translation.en: -is going to be there? -[grunts]
translation.it: Ti rendi conto che ci sarà il sig. Magedzee? Ehi!

translation.en: These tricky twisters were previously unheard of in Zambia, and indeed, Africa.
translation.it: Questi tornado erano sconosciuti in Zambia e in Africa.

translation.en: So why are they happening, Geoffrey?
Blackouts from load shedding were bad enough. Now tornados?
translation.it: Non bastavano i blackout? Ora i tornado?

translation.en: [groans] Likando, why did I join the majorettes?
translation.it: Likando, perché mi sono unita alle majorettes?

translation.en: It's bad enough being the new kid at school.
translation.it: Già ero quella nuova a scuola!

translation.en: Ah-ah, Monde.
Did you forget you were captain of your old majorette team?
translation.it: Eri il capitano della vecchia squadra.

translation.en: You've got this, little sis.
These tornados are just another disaster battering Lusaka.
translation.it: I tornado sono un disastro che colpisce Lusaka.

translation.en: With an increase in crime and daily blackouts, the people are calling for Mayor Sikazwe's resignation.
translation.it: Criminalità, blackout, la gente chiede le dimissioni del sindaco Sikazwe.

translation.en: -[chanting] No more blackouts! -Please! No more load shedding!
translation.it: - Basta blackout e riduzione di carico! - Vi prego!

translation.en: Sisi, if Mayor Sikazwe gets fired, you could lose your job.
translation.it: Se licenziano il sindaco, perderai il lavoro.

translation.en: Don't worry about me.
I don't plan on being the mayor's assistant for long.
I see much bigger and better things for us soon.
translation.it: Ho in mente cose migliori per noi.

translation.en: Iwe Monde! Get over here now!
[sighs] Coming, Marjory.
This is Chipo with Kamiji Secondary's very own star player of the fútbol team,
translation.it: Sono Chipo e sono con la calciatrice migliore della squadra di Kamiji,

translation.en: This is Zee with Kamiji Secondary School's very own Chipo Hamoonga,
translation.it: Sono Zee e lui è Chipo Hamoonga della Scuola Secondaria Kamiji

translation.en: who is crushing on Komana Mwiinga.
translation.it: che ha una cotta per Komana Mwiinga.

translation.en: Stop, ekse! -[Zee laughing]
[Temwe] One vitumbuwa. Two vitumbuwa. Who am I kidding?
translation.it: Un vitumbuwa. Due vitumbuwa. Chi prendo in giro?

translation.en: Thank you, Ba Saasa!
-[Mr. Nkwashi] Hey! -Huh? Temwe Chiti! Are you stealing food?
translation.it: Ehi! Temwe Chiti! Rubi del cibo?

translation.en: Principal Nkwashi, what do you take me for?
translation.it: Preside Nkwashi, per chi mi ha presa?

translation.en: -A delinquent? -Hm.
I've got my eye on you, Chiti.
What's the other eye doing?
[Geoffrey] Lusaka hasn't endured this kind of turmoil in 20 years.
translation.it: Lusaka non viveva un tumulto così da vent'anni.

translation.en: Who can keep our city safe?
Mama K's Juice Ya Cheapa!
-T.O.M.I., come online please. -T.O.M.I. here, Mama K.
The threat is growing, T.O.M.I. We need our new team today to keep our people safe!
translation.it: La minaccia cresce. Serve il nuovo team per proteggerci!

translation.en: Commencing final footage collection to confirm our candidates.
translation.it: Raccolgo i video per confermare i candidati.

translation.en: -Mama K! -[hiccups] Oh!
-Are you all set up? -Oh, yes, Mr. Nkwashi, thank you.
translation.it: Mama K! Siete pronti? Sì, sig. Nkwashi, grazie.

translation.en: Um, if you don't mind, I may need to speak to you later about volunteers for my fruit and vegetable stand.
translation.it: Senta, mi servono volontari per il mio banco di frutta e verdura.

translation.en: Volunteers? Anything to help a member of our little community.
-[slurping] -[Mr. Magedzee] Hello, everybody! Hello, bantu banga.
translation.it: Ciao a tutti! Ragazzi e ragazze.

translation.en: I am Lee Magedzee, owner of Magedzee Power Corporation.
translation.it: Sono il, proprietario della Magedzee Power Corporation.

translation.en: Thank you for inviting me to Kamiji Secondary School's Science Fair.
translation.it: Grazie per l'invito alla fiera della scienza scolastica.

translation.en: At MPC, we are committed to bringing power to the people!
translation.it: Alla MPC ci impegniamo a dare potere alla gente!

translation.en: I am beyond excited to see your inventions and discover if one of you
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di vedere le vostre invenzioni e vedere se tra voi

translation.en: will be the next recipient of our MPC scholarship!
translation.it: ci sarà il vincitore della borsa di studio MPC!

translation.en: The power to save our world starts with you students.
translation.it: Il potere di salvare il mondo inizia con voi.

translation.en: Yes!
Mr. Magedzee!
[clears throat] I am Komana Mwiinga. I would like to apply for the MPC Scholarship.
translation.it: Sono Komana Mwiinga. Vorrei candidarmi per la borsa di studio.

translation.en: So nice to meet you.
May I present to you my Carbon Capture machine.
translation.it: Ecco la mia Macchina Cattura Carbonio.

translation.en: Very intriguing. I'm all ears.
Well, the concept is based on--
translation.it: Beh, il concetto si basa su…

translation.en: Another power station attack. And the tornado is headed here.
translation.it: Un altro attacco. E il tornado è diretto qui.

translation.en: T.O.M.I., focus on the tornado.
translation.it: I.G.O.T., pensa al tornado. Dobbiamo capire!

translation.en: -We need to know what is really going on. -[T.O.M.I.] Yes, Mama K.
translation.it: I.G.O.T., pensa al tornado. Dobbiamo capire! Sì, Mama K.

translation.en: Attention! Take shelter under the stands! Follow me!
translation.it: Attenzione! Rifugiatevi sotto le tribune! Seguitemi!

translation.en: [Ba Saasa] Help! Somebody! I'm trapped.
translation.it: Qualcuno mi aiuti! Sono in trappola!

translation.en: -[gasps] -Help!
Hey! -Help Mr. Nkwashi. -Huh?
Help me, please!
But Ba Saasa! And the vitumbuwa!
translation.it: Ma Ba Saasa! E i vitumbuwa?

translation.en: Help!
-Help! -I've got them!
translation.it: Aiuto! Ci penso io! Posso usare questo, signora?

translation.en: [grunting] May I use this, Gogo?
translation.it: Ci penso io! Posso usare questo, signora?

translation.en: Ba Saasa, use this!
Help!
-Mr. Nkwashi, pull yourself to safety. -Don't tell me what to do, Chiti!
translation.it: - Sig. Nkwashi, si metta in salvo. - Non dirmi cosa fare!

translation.en: But I'm trying to help you! [screams]
Hm. I should have saved the vitumbuwa.
Help! Help!
Help!
-Let's go, Marjory. -Eh! Let's go who?
Let's go, Captain.
-[yells] -I've got you, Chipo!
-Run! -[Chipo yelps]
Gogo, run!
[Geoffrey] A freak tornado ran through the city, striking another power station
translation.it: Un tornado ha colpito un'altra centrale elettrica

translation.en: and wreaking havoc on Kamiji Secondary School.
-Tensions in Lusaka are rising… -[coughing]
…with endemic blackouts bringing life to a standstill, and repeated…
translation.it: con blackout endemici che portano a continui…

translation.en: Komana. [coughing]
Here you go, Ta. Use this.
-Catch your breath. -[inhales]
-Are you okay now? -Yes. Thank you.
Mr. Nkwashi just called. You are required to attend a meeting.
translation.it: Ha chiamato il sig. Nkwashi. Hai una riunione.

translation.en: Are you in trouble?
Huh? What? No. Wait. When is this meeting?
translation.it: Cosa? No. Aspetta. Quand'è la riunione?

translation.en: Mr. Magedzee is giving me another chance to present my Carbon Capture machine.
translation.it: Potrò presentargli la Macchina Cattura Carbonio!

translation.en: At his office in just a few hours!
translation.it: Nel suo ufficio tra poche ore!

translation.en: -Mr. Nkwashi said, "Right now." -[exclaims] And gave me an address.
translation.it: No, dice: "Ora". E mi ha dato un indirizzo.

translation.en: It's not at school. Where is this?
So I guess I'm not the only one with detention.
translation.it: Quindi non sono l'unica in punizione.

translation.en: Yeah, you have the wrong girl. Me? Detention? Aweh. We don't mix.
translation.it: Ti sbagli. Io, in punizione? Ma va, non credo proprio.

translation.en: Me neither. I just moved here.
Oh. Hi. I'm Monde.
[Zee] Hey. Zee.
If we're not serving detention, why did Mr. Nkwashi send us here?
translation.it: Se non siamo in punizione, perché siamo qui?

translation.en: Because I asked him to.
Oh! The Juice Ya Cheapa lady.
Muli bwanji, girls.
[girls] Bwino bwanji, Gogo.
I am Mama K. This is Chomps.
translation.it: Sono Mama K. Lui è Bocconcino.

translation.en: -[bleats] -[Mama K] And you have arrived at my fruit and vegetable stand.
translation.it: E siete al mio banco di frutta e verdura.

translation.en: You four have been offered this great opportunity to give back to your community.
translation.it: Avete la grande opportunità di aiutare la vostra comunità.

translation.en: -Opportunity for free labor, ka. -[giggles]
You will save the world working here.
Eh? Here?
Mm, Gogo. I have an important appointment this afternoon.
From what time to what time are we saving the world?
translation.it: Fino a che ora salveremo il mondo?

translation.en: Right now. But not right here.
Come with me.
What's that story with the old lady luring kids with sweets?
translation.it: Sai la storia della vecchia che attira i bambini con i dolci?

translation.en: She's like a little old gogo, ha. Totally harmless.
translation.it: È solo una nonna, è innocua.

translation.en: -Little old gogo? -Hmm. That's how people disappear.
translation.it: "Solo una nonna"? È così che la gente sparisce.

translation.en: [Mama K] Follow me, please.
Mama weh.
We are going to disappear. [yelps]
As you know, girls,
mysterious tornados have been causing destruction across Lusaka.
translation.it: dei tornado hanno causato distruzione a Lusaka.

translation.en: But there is more to it than meets the eye.
Abeg. You're one of those conspiracy theorists with an underground bunker.
translation.it: Oh, no, è una complottista col bunker sotterraneo.

translation.en: This is where you are going to save the world.
translation.it: È qui che salverete il mondo.

translation.en: What?
-[Temwe] Are you serious? -[Komana] Ati, what?
So cool.
-What? -[bleats]
Wait, does Mr. Nkwashi know about this?
translation.it: Un attimo, il sig. Nkwashi lo sa?

translation.en: No. He just thinks you're volunteering at the stand above.
translation.it: No. Vi crede volontarie del banco di frutta.

translation.en: This is my little secret.
[Komana] What is this place?
Many years ago,
I was part of a secret government agency, working in these very headquarters,
translation.it: ero in un'agenzia segreta in questo quartier generale,

translation.en: fighting evil forces in our city.
Sha! This gogo is lekker.
Eh, eh, eh. Did you just say evil forces? Evil how?
As I was saying,
things are not what they seem. T.O.M.I., pull up drone footage from yesterday.
translation.it: le cose non sono come sembrano. I.G.O.T., i filmati.

translation.en: Artificial intelligence. Artificial boyfriend. [chuckles]
Ah. Technological Operations Management Interface. T.O.M.I.
T.O.M.I., zoom in, please. [T.O.M.I.] Zooming in.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Is that a guy caught in the tornado?
translation.it: È un tizio intrappolato nel tornado?

translation.en: He's not caught in it. [beeping] -[Komana] Basa, he's controlling it.
translation.it: Non è intrappolato. Ragazze, lo sta controllando!

translation.en: [Mama K] Yes! The tornados are not a freak act of Mother Nature.
translation.it: Sì! Non è colpa di Madre Natura.

translation.en: They are an act of a supervillain.
Supervillain? Wait, wait, wait! How? Why?
translation.it: - Un supercattivo? - Un attimo. Come? E perché?

translation.en: I'm not sure yet. We need to find out and put a stop to him.
translation.it: Ancora non lo so. Dobbiamo scoprirlo e fermarlo.

translation.en: We? Did you just say "we"? She just said "we."
Mm. That's what she said. We.
I have been observing you keenly for weeks. [chuckles]
[Temwe] Observing us? You mean like, stalking?
translation.it: Ci osserva? Intende che ci stalkera?

translation.en: It's called gathering intelligence. And based on what I've gathered,
translation.it: Si chiama raccolta d'informazioni. E in base a ciò,

translation.en: it is clear that you are the elite super squad I need to help save Lusaka.
translation.it: so che siete il team di cui ho bisogno per salvare Lusaka.

translation.en: You mean, superheroes!
Uh, yeah. Okay. Superheroes.
And based on my astute observations, I have built super suits distinctive to each of you.
translation.it: E basandomi sulle mie osservazioni, ho costruito delle tute per ognuna di voi.

translation.en: -[gasps] -What? This is so…
[Mama K] They've been designed to boost each of your natural abilities.
translation.it: Progettate per potenziare le vostre abilità.

translation.en: They'll keep you safe and protect your identity.
translation.it: Vi terranno al sicuro proteggendo la vostra identità.

translation.en: All this talk about a suit. So what's with the watch?
translation.it: Parlava di una tuta. Perché un orologio?

translation.en: Can I get a "whoa"?
[girls] Whoa.
Oh! Sorry, Chomps!
[laughing] Oh, it happens.
Now, girls, it is extremely important that you keep your secret identities secret.
translation.it: Ragazze, è estremamente importante mantenere segrete le vostre identità.

translation.en: No one can know.
-Not your sister. -[gasps] [Mama K] Not your father. Not your bestie friend.
translation.it: Né la sorella, né il papà, né la migliore amica.

translation.en: Not your vitumbuwa vendor.
You know about Ba Saasa?
It is for their protection as much as yours.
translation.it: È per proteggere voi e loro.

translation.en: [girls] Yeah. Okay.
It has been 20 years since Lusaka needed a team of heroes.
translation.it: Lusaka aveva bisogno di un team di eroi da 20 anni.

translation.en: If we want our people to survive, they need a team they can depend on.
translation.it: La sopravvivenza della città dipende dal team.

translation.en: But why us, Mama K?
[chuckles] It's not every day a 60-year-old lady sees four young women running into danger, shwi!
translation.it: Non capita tutti i giorni di vedere quattro giovani affrontare il pericolo.

translation.en: Without thinking of themselves.
But being a hero takes more than super strength suits and high-tech gear.
translation.it: Ma per essere eroine non bastano tute e tecnologia.

translation.en: It takes character. Together,
translation.it: Ci vuole carattere. Insieme, avete le qualità che il team richiede.

translation.en: you possess the innate qualities this team requires.
translation.it: Insieme, avete le qualità che il team richiede.

translation.en: Komana, K-Bongo, the lover of knowledge.
Zee, Za-Mpezi, fast like lightning.
translation.it: Zee, Za-Mpezi, veloce come un fulmine.

translation.en: Monde, M-Kozo, the bringer of peace.
translation.it: Monde, M-Kozo, la portatrice di pace.

translation.en: And Temwe, T-Mlilo, full of fire.
translation.it: E Temwe, T-Mlilo, piena di fuoco.

translation.en: Aww! I wanted to be T-Licious.
But T-Mlilo is awesome. Fiyah!
The mind, body, soul, and heart of our team.
translation.it: La mente, il corpo, l'anima e il cuore del nostro team.

translation.en: Together, you are my Team 4.
-Okay! -So, is Team 4 ready to save Lusaka?
translation.it: - Ok! - Le Super 4 sono pronte a salvare Lusaka?

translation.en: -Ya, ya, ya! -Yes, Mama K.
-Yes. Mm. -Yeah!
T-Mlilo in the byu byu!
Eh, byu byu? As in, building?
Eya boom! You got it, Mama K. Za-Mpezi in the byu byu.
translation.it: Evviva! Hai indovinato, Mama K. Za-Mpezi nel Byu Byu.

translation.en: Me too! M-Kozo in the byu byu!
My appointment! I'm going to be late.
K-Bongo, wait!
-Are you in… -The byu byu?
translation.it: - K-Bongo, aspetta! - Sei… Nel Byu Byu?

translation.en: -No. -[girls] What?
I need to get that scholarship from Mr. Magedzee.
translation.it: Mi serve quella borsa di studio.

translation.en: Mama K, I'm sorry.
Wait, ba jobee,
you are leaving all these nice, nice things for the ka scholarship?
translation.it: lasci tutto questo per una borsa di studio?

translation.en: My entire future depends on it.
And my dad.
[sniffles] He's sick.
This is not how I'm going to save the world. I can't… I can't do it all.
translation.it: Non è così che salverò il mondo. Non posso fare tutto.

translation.en: -But-- -Ah, ah. Let her go.
The water may be boiling on the stove, but no one can force you to pour in the mealie meal.
translation.it: La posta in gioco è alta, ma nessuno ti obbliga a rischiare.

translation.en: You have to be hungry.
So, T-Mlilo's Team 3! -[bleats] -How does everyone feel about that?
translation.it: Quindi sono T-Mlilo delle Super 3! Cosa ne pensate?

translation.en: [Mama K] Ah! What is happening, T.O.M.I.?
-[girls] Oh ,no! -Girls, it's Go Go time!
translation.it: - Oh, no! - Ragazze, è ora di andare!

translation.en: [Komana] Thank you for letting me present my project to you.
[Mr. Magedzee] Of course, Komana. We can't let a tornado get in the way of science, can we?
translation.it: Figurati, Komana. Un tornado non può fermare la scienza, no?

translation.en: No, sir.
This is my solar-powered Carbon Capture machine.
translation.it: Questa è la mia Macchina Cattura Carbonio.

translation.en: My machine doesn't just capture carbon.
It uses electricity generated from solar panels
translation.it: Usa elettricità generata dai pannelli solari

translation.en: to split CO2 into energized carbon monoxide and oxygen.
translation.it: per scindere la CO2 in monossido di carbonio e ossigeno.

translation.en: Once carbon monoxide is released, it's combined with hydrogen
translation.it: Una volta rilasciato, il CO si combina all'idrogeno

translation.en: to produce safe, synthetic carbon-based fuels.
Uh-huh. So we can purify dangerous CO2 from the atmosphere while producing clean fuel and oxygen at the other end.
translation.it: Quindi si purifica l'atmosfera dalla CO2 producendo carburante sicuro.

translation.en: It's brilliant. How did you choose solar as your power source?
translation.it: È geniale. Come mai l'energia solare?

translation.en: Well, I looked into a number of energy resources.
Geothermal, wind, even an extremely rare mineral called Zambianite.
translation.it: Geotermica, eolica, persino un minerale raro, la Zambianite.

translation.en: Ah, yes, I've heard of that mineral.
But ultimately, in Lusaka, the sun was the most reliable.
translation.it: Ma a Lusaka il sole era il più affidabile.

translation.en: Very true. And why a portable version of the Carbon Capture machine?
translation.it: Verissimo. E perché farne una versione portatile?

translation.en: My dad developed breathing problems from the pollution, and other people might be suffering the same way.
translation.it: L'inquinamento ha fatto ammalare mio padre e forse è successo anche ad altri.

translation.en: That's what I love! Technology made to benefit the lives of others.
translation.it: Ecco cosa mi piace! Tecnologia creata per aiutare gli altri.

translation.en: Astounding, Komana! I am impressed!
While we have a few candidates left to interview,
I can tell you that you are in the top running. -[people screaming] -We'll have the final results soon.
translation.it: ma posso dirti che sei tra i migliori. Presto avremo i risultati.

translation.en: [gasps] Dad! Um, Mr. Magedzee, I have to go. Thank you, sir.
translation.it: Papà! Sig. Magedzee, devo andare. Grazie.

translation.en: Thank you for…
coming, Komana.
Ta? Ninzi?
-Komana. -Ta? Are you okay?
translation.it: Komana. Papà, stai bene? Sono qui.

translation.en: I'm here, I'm here.
[Komana] Help! Help!
-Did you hear that? -Look, over there!
Imwe, tiyeni!
-[grunting] -Komana! I need help!
Whati?
Huh. Well. That's new.
Ta!
Komana… You know these girls?
Get him in the van. I'll take him to hospital.
Komana. Thank you, daughter.
-Ta. -[coughing]
-You saved my dad's life. -[Mama K] Don't worry, Komana.
translation.it: Hai salvato mio padre. Non preoccuparti, Komana. Starà bene.

translation.en: He's going to be fine.
Mama K, I can save the world in different ways.
translation.it: Mama K, posso salvare il mondo in modi diversi.

translation.en: I see that now.
-Is it too late to… -[chuckles]
Suit up!
Yah!
Bantu banga, we need to get to whoever is inside controlling this!
translation.it: Ragazze, dobbiamo capire chi è il responsabile!

translation.en: T-Mlilo! Let's use your ribbon, like you did with Mr. Nkwashi.
translation.it: T-Mlilo! Usiamo il nastro, come con il sig. Nkwashi.

translation.en: Great idea. [grunts]
Are you hurt?
Just my pride. And my butt.
We got him!
What do we do?
What is that?
It's a brazier!
Look at you, K-Bongo! Breaking up that tornado's cold air with a firebomb.
translation.it: Grande, K-Bongo! Rompere l'aria fredda con una bomba incendiaria?

translation.en: Genius, ekse. Genius.
All this trouble has been caused by some old man.
translation.it: Tutto questo era colpa di un vecchietto?

translation.en: Old?! Old?! I am Storm Drain.
Creator of chaos!
-King of climate! -[beeping]
[chuckles] I will not be defeated!
Looks like you just were, Grandpa.
I can't believe we pulled that off.
[Mama K] Job well done! Congratulations, Team 4!
[Geoffrey] The public was pleasantly surprised when a group of heroes calling themselves Team 4
translation.it: Il pubblico è rimasto sorpreso quando delle eroine, le Super 4,

translation.en: finally put an end to the natural disaster that was not so natural after all.
translation.it: hanno sconfitto un disastro naturale che naturale non era.

translation.en: So, who are these heroes, and where do they come from?
translation.it: Chi sono queste eroine e da dove vengono?

translation.en: Perhaps our pleas for help have finally been answered.
translation.it: Forse le nostre richieste sono state ascoltate.

translation.en: Be careful, Lusaka.
Those pleas will soon be drowned out by my power.
translation.it: Quelle richieste saranno presto soffocate dal mio potere.
